name: Smiterino
summary:
Smiterino is a League of Legends training tool that helps players improve their precision at last-hitting with smite.

With Smiterino, you will be able to contest objects at a rate much higher than standard gaming offers. Junglers training with this APP are much more prepared when it comes to secure or stealing Dragons and Barons.

All rounds are taken from real LoL ranked matches of tier Diamond I, Master or Challenger. Currently, there are 130 different rounds
